div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 08:55 am CDT

div.div: A 50 percent chance of showers, mainly before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. North wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 40. North wind 5 to 13 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. Northwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

div.p: Today we were fortunate to have Columbus Investigators come share their knowledge of drugs, alcohol and bullying. The 4th -6th grade experienced goggles making each student feel under the influence of a substance.

span.span: Welcome to the new St Edward Public School web site. We have been working hard for the past few months to redesign the web site, and we will be making additions over the course of the next several weeks and months. The site will continue to evolve and keep you up to date on important school activities and information. While the site won't be a daily newspaper by any means, it is certainly our goal to keep the content fresh and exciting in an effort to entice you to return often.

br.span: We are excited to tell you that the new

p.span: web site is adaptable for viewing on all mobile devices and that you have a choice on your viewing preference.

The next time you view our website on a tablet or smartphone, our web site will automatically detect your mobile device, display the mobile view and will remember it each time you return. If you change your mind, look for the Full Site/Mobile link on the footer of the web site to toggle back and forth.
In addition to view choices, the mobile view offers additional features. You can learn about them and some interesting facts about mobile access by clicking here.

span.span: e sure to visit the calendar component of the web site. Sign up for weekly or monthly reminders for the events and activities you are interested in. Click
for more details, including instructions for clipping events.
So, take a look now, and then keep checking in with us from time to time; hopefully you'll notice the changes, the new features, etc. Thanks for visiting and come back again soon.

a.aria-label: Read more about Welcome to www.stedpublicschool.org
